data.title: Robert Charles Wilson
data.meta_description: Tor, 2003. 1st. Hardcover. 8vo. Near fine. / Very good. Item #68569 ISBN: 0765302624 Signed on the title page by Robert Wilson. 399pp. Contents are otherwise clean. Black cloth boards remain pointed, attached to tight binding despite very faint rubbing to the bottom edge. Matte dust jacket is in very good condition, unclipped, it shows only minor shelf
